item.title: Democrats lay out demands in prickly DHS funding fight as Republicans balk
item.description: Funding for the Department of Homeland Security still needs to be worked out after President Trump signed a law that reopened most of the federal gove...

item.title: Democrats grill Bessent at House oversight hearing: 'Stop covering for the president'
item.description: Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent took flack from Democrats while testifying before the House Financial Services Committee on Wednesday.

item.title: Trump admin to withdraw 700 federal officers from Minnesota: Homan
item.description: The Trump administration will draw down about 25% of its law enforcement officers from Minnesota on Wednesday, border czar Tom Homan said.

item.title: Supreme Court allows new California congressional districts that favor Democrats
item.description: The high court previously ruled adopting new maps for political advantage cannot be a basis for a federal lawsuit.
